Deb.phrase: Hi, I'm Deb. I make the compost around these parts with my sister.

replies.phrase: What's with the bucket of worms?

Deb.phrase: You can turn junk and seeds into compost, right here in this bucket!

replies.phrase: Neato, I sure wish I had some junk!

Deb.phrase: Here, I have some junk in my pockets. Put it in the compost bucket!
Sure, get me some junk and I can help the other farmers grow some serious vegetables!

replies.phrase: I can get you 20 junk for 50 coins.
I don't think I can do that just yet, sorry.

Deb.phrase: Thanks so much! I'll put that junk to good use!

Rick.phrase: Howdy buddy, I'm Rick but people 'round here call me Cowboy Rick, I'm a strawberry farmer.

replies.phrase: Hi Rick ... I mean Cowboy Rick
What do you know about the landlord? How do we keep Cloudy going?

Rick.phrase: Do you want a few strawberries?
Here you go. be sure to water them with a sprinkler.
Cloudy is a simple place. We try to farm and sell anything extra. That man knows we ain't got the ability to make that kind of money...
I only got a few left, I had to sell a bunch at the market just to do my part in paying for cloudy meadows
If you take the bridge above meb and deb you'll be at the market, a place to sell and buy most things you'll need.

Meb.phrase: Hi, im Meb, I know she got the better name.
Did you know placing compost on dirt helps create a grass tile which has rich soil ready for your hoe.

replies.phrase: Why do the plots turn to dirt?

Meb.phrase: Thats just what happens when you leave a plot open to the air for too long.

Mario.phrase: I may be the local plumber, but I don't take crap from anybody.

Garry.phrase: Hi, I'm Garry, and I'm very tired so please leave me alone.

replies.phrase: But why do you sleep so much?

Garry.phrase: Cause I got nothing better to do since I don't know how to farm, so I just watch time pass me by, now leave me alone.

replies.phrase: Why are you wearing that dress then?

Mira.phrase: Cause I rode that graceful air balloon over to the left
Ride the air balloon over to the park and then come tell me what you saw - I'll give you a flower
Head to Poly Park today and then come back to tell me about it!

OldManJ.phrase: I Heard you're gonna try to save Cloudy Meadows. I may not be able to help much at my old age, but I'm here if you need any advice!
What do you want to know about?
Try eating some of that corn you have and plant the seeds. I also heard that the man west of your farm has some extra strawberries!

replies.phrase: Thanks, can you help with something else?

OldManJ.phrase: First seeds, you can get by buying them or eating crops. Then you grab a hoe to a patch of grass to till it. After you that plant the seeds and wait.

replies.phrase: Thanks, can you help with something else?

OldManJ.phrase: Press Q to eat food! You'll die if you go hungry, so make sure you've always got food on you.

replies.phrase: Thanks, can you help with something else?

OldManJ.phrase: Strawberries, Tomatoes, and Watermelons need water to grow properly. You buy sprinklers in the market. Then, stand on grass and press E.

replies.phrase: Thanks, can you help with something else?

OldManJ.phrase: I don't know much about farming robots, but I heard there is a big automated farm somewhere in the park. You can get there by airship.

replies.phrase: Thanks, can you help with something else?

Brandon.phrase: I love ladybugs I have made so much more corn thanks to them, although they do leave after they eat all my grass.

Brent.phrase: Oh geez, man! Oh gosh so many coins, what if we lose Cloudy Meadows?!

replies.phrase: Anything I can do to help?

Brent.phrase: How does it look? Bad bad bad! Oh geez man, what am I gonna do?

replies.phrase: I'm gonna let you cool off.

Brent.phrase: Yeah man, I am full on freaking out!
Go to Poly Park and tell my mom that I might need a place to stay.

replies.phrase: I don't know where that is.
I can't help right now, sorry.

Brent.phrase: Thanks, my mom will know what to do, she is my superhero.
You might want to take the airship head left for awhile you can't miss it
So do you think you can help me?

replies.phrase: I can't help right now, sorry.

Brent.phrase: As promised, here are some carrots!

BlindPete.phrase: Can you move the rock that sits at the market, I keep running into it

replies.phrase: When I have enough money, Sure.

BlindPete.phrase: Idk how it got there but i've heard there are some really big grass plots over there

replies.phrase: Oh now I want to move it.

BlindPete.phrase: Much appreciated! You made my day!

replies.phrase: Liam sent you a love letter

James.phrase: The red cart on the bottom is where we put anything we want to sell.

replies.phrase: Tell me more about the market please.

James.phrase: There are carts for vegetables fruits and insects, they run out of stock but they'll fill back up every day or so.

replies.phrase: Thanks, that was super helpful James.

James.phrase: A love letter from Liam? Thanks for telling me. Thanks for your help, take cherry.

replies.phrase: Hi Liam, anything I can do to help?

Liam.phrase: I love James, can you give him this love letter for me?

replies.phrase: What do I look like, your love letter collector? I have other things to do.
No sorry I can't do that right now.

Liam.phrase: James likes to hang out in the market. Blonde hair, hot bod can't miss him
Ok but please deliver it today.

goals.reply_phrase: Liam sent you a love letter

Liam.phrase: Thanks so much! As a little gift, have this cherry!

Zoda.phrase: Hi, I’m Zoda, I’d call myself a robot expert. Need to know anything?
Well what do you wanna know about?

replies.phrase: What does the color of the floppy mean?
How do I make them farm?

Zoda.phrase: Well you need a robot of your own, I can give you one of my favorite robots if you do a couple things for me, I'll give you a lvl 1 robot.

replies.phrase: WHA why is a lvl 1 your favorite?

Zoda.phrase: Robots come in 3 levels, lvl 1 has the smallest inv and instruction space, then each level just adds space to both.
Lvl1 recharges with Veggie Oil that you get from a press, Lvl2 recharges when standing on a sprinkler, Lvl3 runs off sunlight
Well can't you see my entire farm runs off of robots?
Red Floppys are for movement based commands, Blue Floppys are for item based commands, and Green Floppys are for logic based commands.
The pc will program a few floppy disks into one golden floppy disk, all you gotta do is put a gold floppy in the pc and add what you want.
The easiest way to learn how to program them would be to just go look at my robots, They range from simple hoeing, to complex farming systems.
Sadly plants don't like it when something stands on them so they won't grow.

replies.phrase: Cloud meadows could use a super heros help right now

Super Tina.phrase: Well, let me know if I can help you.

replies.phrase: I don't need help right now super tina.

Super Tina.phrase: I’ve been told that ladybugs increase how much product your crops produce, but the effect doesn't cross bridges.
Brent needs help? I am on my way!

Guy.phrase: These here part sure are nice
These here part sure are nice Buy all the seeds you want
Well I guess I just have everything a GUY could need
As promised, here's that level 1 robot!

Vinny.phrase: Do you want to have an issue with me kid
It’s my own personal market, now buy something or get lost!

Kenny.phrase: Hi, im Kenny I am just hanging in the swamp I don't live here
Fireflies make it really easy to see what is happening in the swamp
Yep to be honest there is not much to do in the swamp, any reason your here?

Ishmil.phrase: Yea I don't like pants man their prisons for your body

replies.phrase: that's a bit weird but I can respect it
I can see your penis, yea no Bye.

Ishmil.phrase: I only have one piece of clothing left I'll give it to you if you help me out

replies.phrase: My mom always said not to talk to naked strangers bye

Ishmil.phrase: I really need a veggie press

David.phrase: If you look really closely you can see frogs jumping around, for some reason nobody ever steps on them

Adam.phrase: I'm already late for my business appointment, I guess the restaurant to the left will do, they sell big plates of food

replies.phrase: A big plate of food sounds really good.

Barry.phrase: I can't wait for the skate park to be done
Man I am hungry I have had like 8 hotdogs today
Yea thank god for socialized medicine

Mr.C.phrase: I'm gonna buy this place and make all the buildings even taller, so yall better move out my way!

replies.phrase: How much are you buying it for?

Mr.C.phrase: It's gonna cost me $10,000 and there is no way you people are gonna be able to make that much! Not even in 100 days.
I really don't even care you guys are losers
Y'all better start packing cause imma come wrecking

Sarah.phrase: Hi! I'm Sarah, a fashion designer. I love helping people express their style in the big city!

replies.phrase: What kind of fashion do you design?

Sarah.phrase: Everything from casual streetwear to elegant evening wear. I believe everyone deserves to feel confident in what they wear!
Fashion is my passion! It's all about creativity and making people feel good about themselves.

Marcus.phrase: Hey there! Welcome to my cafe. I serve the best coffee and pastries in the city!
Of course! My espresso is legendary. Just watch out, it packs a punch!
Thanks! I put a lot of care into this place. It's my sanctuary in the busy city.

Elena.phrase: Hello! I'm Elena, a street artist. I create murals all over the city to bring color and life to these walls!
Thank you so much! That means a lot. I believe art should be accessible to everyone.
Everything around me! The people, the buildings, nature... the city is full of stories waiting to be painted.

Thomas.phrase: Hey, I'm Thomas, a taxi driver. Been driving around this city for years—I know every street!
Always! Fair rates and safe rides. That's my motto.
You bet! I've picked up people from all walks of life. Each person has their own story.

replies.phrase: I'd love to hear some stories!

Victoria.phrase: Welcome! I'm Victoria, owner of the upscale restaurant here. We serve gourmet cuisine!
We specialize in French and Italian cuisine, all prepared with the finest ingredients.
It is! Elegance and quality are our standards. Come dine with us sometime!

Dante.phrase: Ciao! I'm Dante, head chef. I prepare the finest dishes in the city!
Modern fusion cuisine! I blend traditional techniques with creative new flavors. Every dish is an experience!

Kai.phrase: Hello! I'm Kai, a city guide and travel blogger. I help visitors discover the best of the city!
Sure! Start with the markets, hit up a local cafe, catch some street art, and enjoy the evening energy!
The hidden rooftop gardens! Most tourists miss them, but they're peaceful and beautiful.

Sarah.phrase: Welcome to Sarah's Fashion Boutique! I design the most stylish clothes in the Big City.

replies.phrase: I'd love to see your collection!
Do you have any work for me?

Sarah.phrase: I have the latest fashion magazines, designer clothes, business suits, and briefcases. Perfect for the sophisticated city lifestyle!

replies.phrase: I'll take a look at your shop.
What kind of work do you have?

Sarah.phrase: Actually, I'm preparing for Fashion Week and need someone to help gather materials. Can you collect 50 vegetables for my organic fabric dyes?

replies.phrase: I'll help you with Fashion Week preparations!
That sounds like too much work.

Sarah.phrase: Wonderful! I'll need various vegetables - corn, tomatoes, strawberries, anything from your farm. You have 7 days to collect them!

replies.phrase: Maybe I should think about this more.

Sarah.phrase: Thank you so much! These organic dyes will make my designs stand out at Fashion Week. Here's a designer outfit as your reward!

replies.phrase: Thank you! I can't wait to see your designs.

Marcus.phrase: Hey there! Welcome to Marcus's Cafe - the best coffee spot in the Big City!
I serve fresh coffee, strawberries, hotdogs, and gourmet meals. Perfect for a quick bite or a full dining experience!

replies.phrase: Sounds delicious! I'll check out your menu.
What kind of work do you have?

Marcus.phrase: Actually, I'm looking to expand my cafe's menu. Could you bring me some fresh farm produce? I need 30 strawberries to create new dessert recipes.

replies.phrase: I'd be happy to supply strawberries for your cafe!
I'm not sure I have time for that.

Marcus.phrase: Perfect! I'll pay well for quality strawberries. Can you deliver them within 5 days?
Excellent! Your strawberries are perfect for my new dessert menu. Here's some fresh coffee as thanks!

replies.phrase: Thanks! I look forward to trying your new desserts.

Dante.phrase: Welcome to Dante's Fine Dining! I serve the most exquisite full course meals in the city.
I offer gourmet meals, full course dinners, fine wines, and fresh corn. Everything a discerning palate could desire!

replies.phrase: That sounds amazing! I'll check your selection.

Dante.phrase: I'm planning to expand my restaurant chain across the region. I need someone to establish supply routes - can you prove your reliability by earning 200 coins?

replies.phrase: I'm interested in the restaurant expansion plan!
That's beyond my capabilities right now.

Dante.phrase: Show me you can handle serious business by earning 200 coins in 10 days. This will prove you're ready for restaurant management!
Outstanding! You have the business acumen I'm looking for. Here are some fine wines and coins to start our partnership!

replies.phrase: I look forward to our business partnership!

Elena.phrase: Hi! I'm Elena, the street artist. I capture the soul of the Big City in my paintings.

replies.phrase: I'd love to see your art!
Do you need any help with your art?

Elena.phrase: I sell art supplies and finished paintings. Every piece tells a story about city life!

replies.phrase: I'd love to buy some art!
How can I help with your art?

Elena.phrase: I'm planning a city art exhibition but I'm running low on supplies. Could you help me gather some materials?

replies.phrase: I'd love to help with your art exhibition!
I don't know much about art.

Elena.phrase: I need someone to collect 25 items from around the city - visit different locations and bring back interesting objects for my art installation!

replies.phrase: I'll help collect materials for your installation!

Elena.phrase: Thank you! These materials will create an amazing installation. Here's one of my paintings as thanks!

replies.phrase: I'm honored to have one of your paintings!

Thomas.phrase: Need a ride? I'm Thomas, your reliable taxi driver for the Big City!
I provide taxi fares for quick trips around the city. Much faster than walking!
I'm looking to expand my taxi service to other areas. First, I need to build trust with city residents - can you make 10 trips around different parts of the city?

replies.phrase: I'll help test your city transportation routes!
I'm not really interested in taxi work.

Thomas.phrase: Visit different areas of the city and surrounding regions to help me map out efficient routes. Complete this in 8 days!
Excellent work! You've helped me map out great routes. Here are some complimentary taxi fares as thanks!

replies.phrase: Thanks! I'll use these for future trips.

Victoria.phrase: Greetings. I'm Victoria, a tech entrepreneur and business consultant.

replies.phrase: What kind of business do you do?

Victoria.phrase: I deal in technology - smartphones, laptops, and digital infrastructure for modern businesses.

replies.phrase: I'm interested in your technology products!

Victoria.phrase: I'm launching a startup incubator for city entrepreneurs. I need someone with proven business sense - earn 300 coins to show you're ready for entrepreneurship!

replies.phrase: I'm ready for the entrepreneurship challenge!
That's way beyond my current level.

Victoria.phrase: Prove your business acumen by earning 300 coins in 12 days. This will qualify you for my startup program!

replies.phrase: This is too advanced for me.

Victoria.phrase: Impressive! You have what it takes to succeed in business. Here's a smartphone to get you started in the tech world!

replies.phrase: Thank you! I'm excited about this opportunity.

Kai.phrase: Hey! I'm Kai, the official Big City tour guide. I know all the best spots in town!
I sell city maps, concert tickets, and museum passes. I can show you all the hidden gems and popular attractions!

replies.phrase: I'd like to buy a city map!

Kai.phrase: I'm organizing a city tourism campaign. I need someone to help promote local attractions - can you visit 15 different locations to gather information for tour materials?

replies.phrase: I'd love to help with the tourism campaign!
That sounds like too much travel.

Kai.phrase: Explore various locations around the city and surrounding areas to help me create comprehensive tour materials. You have 9 days!

replies.phrase: I'll help promote the city's attractions!

Kai.phrase: Fantastic! Your help will make the tourism campaign a success. Here are some museum passes as thanks!

replies.phrase: Thank you! I'll use these passes to explore more.

Coral.phrase: Hey dude! I'm Coral, and I basically live on my surfboard!

replies.phrase: That sounds awesome! Do you surf every day?
Can you teach me about surfing?

Coral.phrase: For sure! The waves here are totally radical. Best time is early morning when the sun's just coming up!

replies.phrase: Tell me more about the beach!

Coral.phrase: Surfing's all about balance and reading the waves. But first, you gotta respect the ocean!

replies.phrase: What do you mean by respecting the ocean?

Coral.phrase: The ocean gives us so much - waves, fish, good vibes. We gotta keep it clean! Hey, can you help me with something?
I want to organize a beach cleanup, but I need some supplies. Can you bring me 15 vegetables? I'll trade them for stuff to make snacks for volunteers!

replies.phrase: I'll help with the beach cleanup!

Coral.phrase: You're the best! The beach is gonna be so clean now. Here are some fish I caught this morning - fresh from the ocean!

replies.phrase: Thanks Coral! Keep catching those waves!

Fisher Joe.phrase: Ahoy there! Name's Fisher Joe. Been fishing these waters for 40 years!

replies.phrase: Wow, that's a long time! Any good stories?
Can you teach me about fishing?

Fisher Joe.phrase: Oh, I got stories for days! Once caught a fish so big it nearly pulled me right into the water! But the real treasure is the peace and quiet out here.

replies.phrase: Sounds amazing! Tell me more about fishing.

Fisher Joe.phrase: Fishing's simple - patience, the right bait, and knowing when to reel 'em in. The swimming and fishing here at the beach is perfect for it!

replies.phrase: I'll give it a try sometime.

Fisher Joe.phrase: Actually, yeah! My old fishing net broke and I need materials to fix it. Can you bring me 20 units of any items? I'll make it worth your while!

replies.phrase: I'll help you fix your fishing net!
I don't have time right now.

Fisher Joe.phrase: You're a good soul! My net's all fixed up now. Here, take these rare fish - caught 'em just this morning!

replies.phrase: Thanks Joe! Good luck with your fishing!

Sandy.phrase: Hi! I'm Sandy! I love collecting seashells and building sandcastles on the beach!

replies.phrase: That sounds fun! What kind of shells do you collect?

Sandy.phrase: All kinds! Spiral shells, clam shells, even some really rare ones that wash up after storms. Each one tells a story of the ocean!

replies.phrase: That's beautiful! Can I help with anything?

Sandy.phrase: Every single day! This beach is my happy place. I know every tide pool and hidden cove around here!

replies.phrase: Can I help you with something?

Sandy.phrase: Actually, yes! I'm trying to visit all the amazing places around here. Can you show me around? Visit the Beach, the Big City, and Cloudy Meadows, then come back and tell me all about them!

replies.phrase: I'd love to be your tour guide!

Sandy.phrase: Oh my gosh, thank you so much! I can't wait to hear all about your adventures! Here are some flowers I picked from around the beach!

Skipper.phrase: Yo! I'm Skipper, professional beach volleyball player and part-time lifeguard!
It's super intense! Great workout, amazing team dynamics, and nothing beats diving in the sand for an epic save!

replies.phrase: Do you need help with anything?

Skipper.phrase: It's rewarding! Keeping everyone safe while they enjoy the beach. The sunset shifts are the best - so peaceful.
Yeah, actually! We're hosting a big beach tournament and I need to stock up on snacks and refreshments. Can you bring me 25 fruits? Gotta keep the players energized!

replies.phrase: I'll help supply the beach tournament!

Skipper.phrase: You're awesome! The tournament was a huge success thanks to you! Here are some fish - fresh catch of the day!

Alex Chen.phrase: Welcome to the Big City! I'm Alex Chen, a local business owner. Business is booming around here!
I run a logistics company here in the city. We ship goods all over.
I'm always looking for good opportunities in the city. Maybe we can do business together!
Enjoy exploring the city—check out the markets, parks, and harbor. Lots to see!

Priya Patel.phrase: Hello! I'm Priya Patel, an artist here in the city. I create beautiful installations around town.
Thank you! I love creating pieces that inspire people. Your encouragement means a lot!

replies.phrase: Can I help you with something?

Priya Patel.phrase: I create abstract sculptures and paintings that reflect the urban landscape. Very modern and bold!
Actually, I'm organizing an art exhibition! I need to collect 30 creative items to display. Can you help gather supplies?

replies.phrase: I'll help gather items for your exhibition!

Marcus Brown.phrase: Hey there! I'm Marcus Brown, a city councilman. Always working to make the city better!
I'm responsible for city planning, infrastructure, and making sure everyone's happy. It's a lot of work!

replies.phrase: What can I do to help?

Marcus Brown.phrase: I'm always open to help! The city could use some community support to keep things running smoothly.
We need funds to improve our city parks and public spaces. Can you help us raise 500 coins? Every bit helps make our city more beautiful!

replies.phrase: I'll help fund the city improvements!

Sophia Moore.phrase: Hi! I'm Sophia Moore, a chef and food critic. I love everything about food!

replies.phrase: Tell me about food in the city

Sophia Moore.phrase: The Big City has amazing restaurants and food vendors. We have everything from street food to fine dining!

replies.phrase: Can you help me with something?

Sophia Moore.phrase: I absolutely love fresh vegetables and quality ingredients. Cooking with fresh produce is what makes food amazing!
I'm planning a food festival for the city! I need quality vegetables for our cooking demonstrations. Can you bring me 40 vegetables?

replies.phrase: I'll help with the food festival!

Jordan Kim.phrase: Hey! I'm Jordan Kim, an environmentalist working to make the city more green and sustainable.

replies.phrase: Tell me more about your work

Jordan Kim.phrase: I'm promoting urban gardening and sustainability throughout the city. We're planting trees and creating green spaces everywhere!
Actually, I would really appreciate some help! We need supplies for our green initiatives.
We need compost and gardening tools to plant trees around the city. Can you bring us 60 compost and 20 tools? It would help make the city greener!

replies.phrase: I'll help make the city greener!

Kiah.phrase: Hi! I'm Kiah. I love exploring the Big City and finding great food spots.
If you're hungry, try the local markets and cafes—fresh veggies and fruit everywhere!
